title: Chapter 4383 - Chapter 4383: 4,382 Seconds To Kill Anyone Below The Great Dao Level
body:
Chapter 4383 - Chapter 4383: 4,382 Seconds To Kill Anyone Below The Great Dao Level

Chapter 4383: 4,382 seconds to kill anyone below the Great Dao level

Crack! Crack! Crack

Ao Cangtian’s figure appeared in Wang Xian’s hands instantly.

All the powerhouses didn’t react in time.

Even Ao Cangtian himself.

When he felt his neck being strangled by a palm, when he felt his body being completely restrained…

His face was filled with horror and disbelief.

His heart was beating violently. If his body wasn’t being imprisoned, he would definitely be trembling non-stop.

His eyes were filled with disbelief.

What was going on?

How was this possible! !

He was a great dao expert, and he had a heavenly yuan destiny treasure.

However, he was actually grabbed by a great dao expert in an instant.

What level was it that could make him unable to react in time.

At this moment, he sensed that the young man, who he thought was only at the control level, reached out to grab the heavenly yuan destiny treasure between his brows.

An intense sound rang out.

He wanted to resist, but he couldn’t resist at all.

The terrifying suppressive force made him unable to even speak.

He could feel that the ultimate treasure of Heaven’s origin that was located between his brows was about to be taken away by him.

It was about to be taken away by him!

“A metal-attributed ultimate treasure of Heaven’s origin, not bad.”

Wang Xian stared at the ultimate treasure of Heaven’s origin that was located between his brows and commented indifferently.

The strength of this proud heaven was only at the Great Dao level plus one control level.

However, what about Wang Xian’s current strength?

Chaos level plus one Great Dao level, one control level, and one beginner level!

Wang Xian was much, much stronger than him!

Furthermore, AO Cangtian and the rest were very close to Wang Xian.

In Wang Xian’s opinion, this was undoubtedly an act of courting death.

Since they were so close to him, as long as he made a slight move, he would be able to grab them instantly!

He smiled as he looked at this metal-type ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin creation.

This ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin creation was indeed not bad. Wang Xian could use it.

Although there was a limit to the number of ultimate treasures of the Heaven’s origin creation that every powerhouse could control.

There was only one attack-type ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin creation that could be controlled.

But now, the void disk, this attack-type ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin creation, was controlled by the Void Divine Dragon.

It had no effect on Wang Xian’s actual body.

He could still control an attack-type ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin creation.

Of course, with this external force, Wang Xian could only control an additional ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin creation.

But this was not a small improvement.

After all, an ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin creation was equivalent to an increase in the combat strength of a control level!

Wang Xian accepted this treasure with a smile!

“This… This is impossible. This is impossible. husband, husband!”

In the sky, the strong disciples from the Cang Heaven Universe and the belief universe were stunned.

They looked at this scene in disbelief.

The woman next to Ao Cangtian was the first to react. Her eyes were wide open as she stared at this scene in disbelief. She cried out involuntarily!

The four control-level experts from the belief universe also felt a chill in their hearts. A horrified expression appeared on their faces.

How was this possible?

What level of experts could instantly kill a great dao-level existence?

Could it be?

Their pupils constricted slightly as they swallowed a mouthful of saliva. Their eyes were filled with fear.

They knew that they had offended an existence that they could not afford to offend!

Crack

At this moment, Wang Xian removed the Heaven’s origin creation treasure from Ao Cangtian’s glabella. He stared at him and said, “I will accept this Heaven’s origin creation treasure with a smile. You Can Die Now!”

Bang

Wang Xian stared at him and clenched his fist lightly!

An extremely terrifying energy enveloped him instantly.

The life force of AO Cangtian disappeared rapidly.

Wang Xian waved his arm and kept ao Cangtian’s corpse.

“Run!”

At this moment, the four heaven origin creation realm powerhouses from the belief universe were horrified. They shouted in shock!

Run!

They encountered an existence at the chaos level.

An invincible existence.

Even if all of them joined forces, they were still no match for him.

Furthermore, they did not want to provoke the four controlling-level powerhouses of the belief universe!

“If you can escape, you can’t escape from the temple.”

Wang Xian looked at their fleeing figures and said calmly!

He did not stop them because there was no need to stop them.

Right now, he wanted to destroy all the powerhouses of the Cang Heaven Universe.

Since he had decided to destroy the Cang Heaven universe, he could not kill the powerhouses of the belief universe unscrupulously for the time being.

If they were to join forces, it would be a huge problem to destroy them all.

The belief universe was very strong.

Even if they were to join forces with the firmament universe, Wang Xian and the Dragon Palace would not be able to destroy them.

Therefore, he did not stop the powerhouses of the belief universe from escaping.

However, he would not let them off!

When the four control-level powerhouses of the belief universe escaped.

In the Cang Heaven Universe, there were only three control-level powerhouses and five beginner-level powerhouses!

Wang Xian looked at them, his eyes filled with coldness.

“This… this…”

The other eight heaven origin creation-level powerhouses were stunned!

Gulp

At the side, the undead could not help but swallow a mouthful of saliva. Their faces were also filled with astonishment.

What was the Dragon King’s strength?

It was the Great Dao level of Ao ‘Cang ‘Tian. He instantly killed it.

Could it be the legendary chaos level?

They had never even seen such a level before.

Moreover, they had never heard of the existence of the chaos realm in the land of origin.

Now, a living chaos level powerhouse was right in front of them.

Furthermore, this was Mu Litianci’s foster father.

This? ? ?

The true strength of the Dragon King was actually so terrifying?

Not only were the undead and the rest shocked by Wang Xian’s strength, even Tianci was a little dumbfounded.

In the past, he knew that his foster father’s strength was only at the Great Dao level.

Now, he had actually reached the chaos-level?

This? ?

“It’s Your Turn!”

Wang Xian stared at the other group of Heaven’s origin manifestation powerhouses in the Cang Heaven Universe and said indifferently!

Buzz

Upon hearing Wang Xian’s words, the woman’s body trembled violently. Without any hesitation, a red cloth strip appeared in his hand.

The red cloth strip enveloped him.

This was a powerful escape treasure.

Buzz

However, the energy on Wang Xian’s body trembled slightly. The red cloth in his hand collapsed immediately.

“You want to escape in front of me?”

Wang Xian stared at the woman and said faintly, “Didn’t you say that you wanted to snatch the heaven-bestowed heaven-blessed treasure for your child? In my opinion, you should die together with your husband and your child!”

“Resist! Run!”

At the side, an old man at the control level was on the verge of breaking down as he shouted loudly.

They wanted to escape!
